628570.name: Trivia Night
628570.description:
Trivia Night is a fun 80s themed quiz game. It has different game modes. You can play with your friend or on your own!

  • Different game modes: Normal Trivia, True or False, Fun with Flags, Math, Words.

  • Gamepad Support

  • Local Multiplayer

You have two options, true or false. 50% chance. Focus because you have to decide whether the statements are true or false. Time is running out!

"Was this the color of this country? Was it blue? No, no. It was purple! To which country does this flag belong?" Hope you remember correctly.

How good are your maths skills? Can you find all numbers in the screen on a limited time? Test yourself and find out.

How creative are you? Can you make a word by putting one letter to another word? You can play with your friends, with a bot or online.
